original_text: The Israelites who had returned to Jerusalem from exile were building the temple for the Lord, Israel's God. The enemies of the people of Judah and Benjamin heard that the Israelites had begun to build.
korean_text: 사로잡혔던 자들의 자손이 이스라엘의 하나님 여호와의 성전을 건축한다 함을 유다와 베냐민의 대적이 듣고

sentences.original_text: The Israelites who had returned to Jerusalem from exile
sentences.korean_translation: 포로 생활에서 예루살렘으로 돌아온 이스라엘 사람들은

sentences.original_text: were building the temple for the Lord
The enemies of the people of Judah and Benjamin
heard that the Israelites had begun to build
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 사람들이 건축을 시작했다는 소식을 들었습니다
